enum  cfg_record_type { PORTALS_CFG_TYPE = 1, LUSTRE_CFG_TYPE = 123 }

Define Documentation

#define LCFG_REQUIRED   0x0001000

If the LCFG_REQUIRED bit is set in a configuration command, then the client is required to understand this parameter in order to mount the filesystem.

If it does not understand a REQUIRED command the client mount will fail.

Definition at line 69 of file lustre_cfg.h.

#define LUSTRE_CFG_BUFLEN ( lcfg,
idx   ) 
Value:
((lcfg)->lcfg_bufcount <= (idx)         \
         ? 0                                    \
         : (lcfg)->lcfg_buflens[(idx)])

Definition at line 146 of file lustre_cfg.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum lcfg_command_type
Enumerator:
LCFG_ATTACH 

create a new obd instance

LCFG_DETACH 

destroy obd instance

LCFG_SETUP 

call type-specific setup

LCFG_CLEANUP 

call type-specific cleanup

LCFG_ADD_UUID 

add a nid to a niduuid

LCFG_DEL_UUID 

remove a nid from a niduuid

LCFG_MOUNTOPT 

create a profile (mdc, osc)

LCFG_DEL_MOUNTOPT 

destroy a profile

LCFG_SET_TIMEOUT 

set obd_timeout

LCFG_SET_UPCALL 

deprecated

LCFG_ADD_CONN 

add a failover niduuid to an obd

LCFG_DEL_CONN 

remove a failover niduuid

LCFG_LOV_ADD_OBD 

add an osc to a lov

LCFG_LOV_DEL_OBD 

remove an osc from a lov

LCFG_PARAM 

set a proc parameter

LCFG_MARKER 

metadata about next cfg rec

LCFG_LOG_START 

mgc only, process a cfg log

LCFG_LOG_END 

stop processing updates

LCFG_LOV_ADD_INA 

like LOV_ADD_OBD, inactive

LCFG_ADD_MDC 

add an mdc to a lmv

LCFG_DEL_MDC 

remove an mdc from a lmv

LCFG_SPTLRPC_CONF 

security

LCFG_POOL_NEW 

create an ost pool name

LCFG_POOL_ADD 

add an ost to a pool

LCFG_POOL_REM 

remove an ost from a pool

LCFG_POOL_DEL 

destroy an ost pool name

LCFG_SET_LDLM_TIMEOUT 

set ldlm_timeout

LCFG_PRE_CLEANUP 

call type-specific pre cleanup cleanup

LCFG_SET_PARAM 

use set_param syntax to set a proc parameters

LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD 

create a cluster

LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL 

destroy a cluster

LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD_RANGE 

add a nid range

LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL_RANGE 

delete an nid range

LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD_UIDMAP 

add a uidmap

LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL_UIDMAP 

delete a uidmap

LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD_GIDMAP 

add a gidmap

LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL_GIDMAP 

delete a gidmap

LCFG_NODEMAP_ACTIVATE 

activate cluster id mapping

LCFG_NODEMAP_ADMIN 

allow cluster to use id 0

LCFG_NODEMAP_TRUSTED 

trust a clusters ids

LCFG_NODEMAP_SQUASH_UID 

default map uid

LCFG_NODEMAP_SQUASH_GID 

default map gid

LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD_SHKEY 

add shared key to cluster

LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL_SHKEY 

delete shared key from cluster

LCFG_NODEMAP_TEST_NID 

test for nodemap membership

LCFG_NODEMAP_TEST_ID 

test uid/gid mapping
